snippet: Hou Yifan’s victory in this year’s Grand Prix series may help her defend the women’s world championship.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes third straight Grand Prix title won by Hou Yifan of China.
lead_paragraph: Hou Yifan’s victory in this year’s Grand Prix series may help her defend the women’s world championship.

headline.main: Women’s Champion Builds War Chest for Title Defense
headline.print_headline: Women’s Champion Builds War Chest for Title Defense
